sub_title: Data-Driven Marketer l design thinking | Facilitator | Customer Experience | Digital Transformation | Innovation
summary:
With over a decade’s commercial and design thinking experience in the international environment, I am a data-driven creative thinker. I value growth, balance, respect, trustworthy, and diversity. I manage complexity and seek challenge. 

I’m motivated by a belief that humanity & innovation & technologies & can be leveraged not only to enhance business profits but also to maximize customer experience or to create meaningful social impact. Hence I work with data analysis, facilitation, coaching, project management, which are essential to business transformation and strategy planning. 

Curious, authentic, and enthusiastic, I have worked across countries: Canada, China, Germany, India, Morocco, Netherlands, and Taiwan. I am a team player and love to inspire and to motivate people around me. “Sharing is about caring”, works for me personally and professionally.

Gallup Strengths: Empathy, Learning, Positivity, Ideation, Input.
Tools: Salesforce, Tableau, Google Data Studio, Marketo, Customer Data Platform, Adobe Analysis, Workzone, Jira, Smartsheet, etc.

profile_positions.description:
With decades’s of marketing experience and design thinking practice, I join Oracle CX Marketing Solutions team to support sales with an innovative value selling approach, to maximise our customer experience and differentiate our product solutions.
Focus on Customer Data Platform.
profile_positions.title: Principal CX Solution Engineer

profile_positions.description:
At Enga Technology, we believe that energy technology innovation can bring about a better life for everyone. That’s why we are dedicated to providing the most cost-effective energy storage products and services to enable every user to benefit from our solutions. Join us in our vision of making energy more efficient and clean for a brighter future. 
HQ in China with customers in Germany and USA at this moment, Enga started to operate in 2023. 

https://www.en-ga.com
profile_positions.title: Business Advisor

profile_positions.description:
#IamRemarkable is an initiative empowering women and underrepresented groups to speak openly about their accomplishments in the workplace and beyond, thereby breaking modesty norms and glass ceilings. I offer #IamRemarkable workshop on pro bono basis. As a facilitator my role involves hosting workshops and being an ambassador for #IamRemarkable within my personal and professional networks.
To learn more and join the initiative visit:​ ​g.co/IamRemarkable
profile_positions.title: #IamRemarkable Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
- Improved campaign ROI with marketing performance data analysis on leads/funnel/bookings
- Built a data driven culture by setting performance metrics and developing reports (WoW, MoM. YoY) 
- Integrated digital marketing data to optimize marketing activities and customer experience 
- Handled Salesforce and Marketo database, and generated insights in real time with Tableau
- Designed and facilitated design thinking workshops to support sales strategic accounts

Tools: Tableau, Adobe analytics, Salesforce, Marketo, etc.

volunteer_experiences.description:
As part of Oracle's green team, my ambition is to share Oracle's multitude of green activities and achievements, develop green guidelines, and further to lead GREEN in the industry. 

In our team of volunteers from different backgrounds and departments, we strive to develop new ideas and drive initiatives to go beyond the necessary. Our efforts impact Oracle Netherlands on national scale.

volunteer_experiences.role: Women’s Association of Verizon Employees (WAVE) - EMEA Business Lead
volunteer_experiences.description:
WAVE supports the professional development and advancement of women in the workforce not only within Verizon but within our communities. 
We embrace Diversity and Inclusion
Volunteered for organizing photo press exhibition
